channel.title: Paypal
channel.description:
Why does paypal want me to add a credit card when I want to purchase a domain, I already have enough money.... But I have no card.
Anyone know of a way around this?

item.title: Paypal
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

You don’t need to be verified to be able to use paypal, you just have to have a credit card attached. There is nothing else you can do.

Read full topic

item.title: Paypal
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:3, topic:251260”][quote author=runescape3dude link=topic=331610.msg2588714#msg2588714 date=1229644765]
Why does paypal want me to add a credit card when I want to purchase a domain, I already have enough money… But I have no card.

Anyone know of a way around this?
[/quote]
no way around it, They have a verification process when you have a unverified account you cannot make transactions larger than 3 USD i believe.[/quote]

Uh I spent $800 when I used to be unverified.

Read full topic

item.title: Paypal
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Ask someone that have a CC.
That will not be a big problem.

Read full topic

no way around it, They have a verification process when you have a unverified account you cannot make transactions larger than 3 USD i believe.[/quote]

item.description:

Why not get your own card, I think you can get it if you are 13 or older.
